attributes.action: Stop any Benefits Payments for over Three Children to Help the Country
attributes.additional_details:
It’s Common Sense that the Wildlife is in Decline to to Humans and increased Families having Large Families.

It has to be Controlled at some stage either now or future.

If Families did NOT get Benefits as stated they would Not depend on Government handouts.
attributes.background:
Seeing the Countries Is getting over populated and more and more Land being taken from the Wildlife it makes sense, Humans are Destroying the The World and so it’s up to us to try and save it, we need to Kerb the need to have Many Children NOW.

This would reduce Houses being Built.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The government has already introduced a limit on these benefit payments, so families won’t be paid an additional amount for more than 2 children, unless the children were born before 6 April 2017.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
